assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study protocol received ethical approval from the Research Ethics Committee UZ/KU Leuven (MP010414). The questionnaire was anonymous and participation was voluntary.

funder.name: This project was financially supported by the Research Fund Flanders (FWO).
